__e: Has he made any Crazy Ivans?
Ivan "the Terrible" was quick to realize... there was only one thing he could do.
I take it this is the "crazy" in Crazy Ivan?
I appreciate what you did for me with Ivan, and I trust your abilities in the field.
He lied, Ivan, and told me that my mother died.
Because we could wait till we get to the safe house, go over the plan with Ivan and the team.
Ivan thought it might be a good idea for us to have some transportation for our investigation.
And Ivan was shot in the back, so he probably didn't even know that it was coming.
But we can't just sit here and do nothing. Now that we know that Ivan has put the weapon in the hands of his government are you proposing that we use ours?
